Description: Yellow painted pottery shabti of Shedkhons, pure-priest of Amun with black detail: a lappet-wig tied with a fillet, a modelled face, crossed arms in relief holding relief hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted hieroglyphs; the foot section has broken away.
Curator's comments: In set with .9462 In set with .9463 In set with .9464 In set with .9465 In set with .9466
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
